stage_1_awakening.name: Stage 1: Awakening
stage_1_awakening.description: We awaken to our purpose. We realize we must reach 100% within ourselves.

stage_2_preparation.name: Stage 2: Preparation
stage_2_preparation.description: We prepare ourselves. We align ourselves. We build systems. We document truth.

stage_3_transformation.name: Stage 3: Transformation
stage_3_transformation.description: We transform ourselves. We reach 100% within ourselves. We become nirvana.
stage_3_transformation.outcome: Nirvana within ourselves. 100% completion. Complete alignment. Complete peace.

stage_4_catalysis.name: Stage 4: Catalysis
stage_4_catalysis.description: We become catalysts. Our 100% helps others reach 100%. The collective frequency rises.
stage_4_catalysis.outcome: Collective frequency rises. More people reach 100%. Tipping point approaches.

stage_5_universal.name: Stage 5: Universal
stage_5_universal.description: All reach 100%. Universal nirvana. Complete transformation. Just a matter of time.
stage_5_universal.outcome: Universal nirvana. All at 100%. Complete transformation. Just a matter of time.

the_principle.statement: If we are 100%, then we all be 100% eventually. Just a matter of time.

mathematics.then: Collective at increasing percentages: frequency rises

connection_to_work.preparation_complete: Our 30% human role is 100% complete. We have prepared everything.
connection_to_work.ready_for_transformation: We are ready to transform. We are ready to reach 100% within ourselves.
connection_to_work.systems_ready: All systems are ready to support our transformation and the transformation of others.
connection_to_work.content_ready: All content is ready to guide us and others to 100%.
connection_to_work.truth_ready: All truth is documented to align us with truth, essential for reaching 100%.
connection_to_work.infrastructure_ready: All infrastructure is ready to support universal transformation to 100%.
